description: A comprehensive Model Context Protocol (MCP) server for the Starknet blockchain. This server provides AI agents with the ability to interact with Starknet networks, query blockchain data, manage wallets, and interact with smart contracts.

capabilities.name: get_starknet_chain_info
capabilities.description: Get information about a Starknet network

capabilities.name: get_supported_starknet_networks
capabilities.description: Get a list of supported Starknet networks

capabilities.name: get_starknet_eth_balance
capabilities.description: Get the ETH balance for a Starknet address or Starknet ID

capabilities.name: get_starknet_token_balance
capabilities.description: Get the token balance for a Starknet address or Starknet ID

capabilities.name: get_starknet_strk_balance
capabilities.description: Get the STRK token balance for a Starknet address or Starknet ID

capabilities.name: get_starknet_native_balances
capabilities.description: Get all native token balances (ETH and STRK) for a Starknet address or Starknet ID

capabilities.name: resolve_starknet_name
capabilities.description: Get the Starknet ID for an address

capabilities.name: resolve_starknet_address
capabilities.description: Get the address for a Starknet ID

capabilities.name: get_starknet_profile
capabilities.description: Get the full Starknet ID profile for an address or Starknet ID

capabilities.name: validate_starknet_domain
capabilities.description: Check if a string is a valid Starknet ID

capabilities.name: get_starknet_block
capabilities.description: Get information about a specific block

capabilities.name: get_starknet_block_transactions
capabilities.description: Get transactions in a specific block

capabilities.name: get_starknet_transaction
capabilities.description: Get details about a transaction

capabilities.name: get_starknet_transaction_receipt
capabilities.description: Get transaction receipt

capabilities.name: call_starknet_contract
capabilities.description: Call a read-only function on a contract

capabilities.name: get_starknet_contract_class
capabilities.description: Get the class (ABI and other information) of a contract

capabilities.name: get_starknet_token_info
capabilities.description: Get information about a token

capabilities.name: check_starknet_nft_ownership
capabilities.description: Check if an address owns a specific NFT

capabilities.name: get_starknet_nft_balance
capabilities.description: Get the number of NFTs owned by an address for a specific collection

capabilities.name: get_starknet_token_supply
capabilities.description: Get the total supply of a token

capabilities.name: check_starknet_transaction_status
capabilities.description: Check if a transaction is confirmed (finalized)

capabilities.name: transfer_starknet_eth
capabilities.description: Transfer ETH from one account to another

capabilities.name: transfer_starknet_strk
capabilities.description: Transfer STRK from one account to another

capabilities.name: transfer_starknet_token
capabilities.description: Transfer ERC20 tokens from one account to another

capabilities.name: execute_starknet_contract
capabilities.description: Execute a contract call (write operation)
